mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cultural_properties (id, category_code, management_number, city_code, cultural_properties_name, category_name, region, district, dynasty, address, registration_date, classify_a, classify_b, classify_c, classify_d, content, main_img_url, img_url, img_desc, video_url, narration_url, longitude, latitude) VALUES (#{id}, #{categoryCode}, #{managementNumber}, #{cityCode}, #{culturalPropertiesName}, #{categoryName}, #{region}, #{district}, #{dynasty}, #{address}, #{registrationDate}, #{classifyA}, #{classifyB}, #{classifyC}, #{classifyD}, #{content}, #{mainImgUrl}, #{imgUrl}, #{imgDesc}, #{videoUrl}, #{narrationUrl}, #{longitude}, #{latitude})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY id DESC) AS rownum, c.* FROM cultural_properties c) c2 WHERE c2.rownum BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cultural_properties WHERE
category_name = #{category}
AND cultural_properties_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND region LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')
AND dynasty LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dynasty}, '%')

update.foreach: UPDATE cultural_properties SET cultural_properties_name = #{item.culturalPropertiesName}, category_name = #{item.categoryName}, region = #{item.region}, dynasty = #{item.dynasty}, address = #{item.address}, registration_date = #{item.registrationDate}, classify_a = #{item.classifyA}, classify_b = #{item.classifyB}, classify_c = #{item.classifyC}, classify_d = #{item.classifyD} WHERE id = #{item.id}
